document.heading: Fire Alarm Notice and Tenant Fire Safety Amendment Act of 2009

history.narrative: Law 18-116, the “Fire Alarm Notice and Tenant Fire Safety Amendment Act of 2009”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-178, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 1, 2009, and December 15, 2009, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 11, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-264 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-116 became effective on March 11, 2010.
